mapper.insert: insert into auction (auction_seller , auction_buyer, auction_amount , auction_mall_key) value (#{auction_seller},#{auction_buyer},#{auction_amount}, #{auction_mall_key})
mapper.select: select count(*) from auction where auction_seller=#{uid} or auction_seller=#{uid}

select *, date_format(Auction_regDate,'%Y.%m.%d %T') as fmtdate from auction, mall where mall_key = auction_mall_key and
auction_seller like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
auction_buyer like concat('%', #{word}, '%')
order by auction_regDate desc limit #{start}, #{size}
